title: Curved Spacetime Geometry for Strings and Affine Non-compact Algebras
abstract: Based on lectures delivered at (1) the AMS meeting at USC, Nov. 1992 (2) Conference on Quantum Aspects of Black Holes, ITP, UC- Santa %Barbara, %%June 1993.
